alert.note: Alert for Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:27AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Kent, Talbot, south central Queen Anne`s and Caroline Counties through 415 AM EDT... At 327 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Skipton to near Tilghman Island. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easton, Talbot, Denton, Harrington, Ridgely, Trappe, St. Michaels, Preston, Oxford, Queen Anne, Smithville, Copperville, Agner, Choptank, Windyhill, Andrewsville, Tanyard, Harmony, Tilghman Island and Skipton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
